channel.title: startup on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in startup on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-08
item.description: Samsung confirms hackers stole Galaxy source code (2 minute read) Samsung has confirmed that hackers successfully stole internal company data and source code.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-20
item.description: Altos bursts out of stealth with $3B, a dream team C-suite and a wildly ambitious plan to reverse disease (3 minute read) Altos Labs is a biotech company that is developing technology that could revitalize cells and reverse disease, ultimately prolonging human life.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-06
item.description: Venmo now has a credit card (1 minute read) Venmo has announced a new credit card that can be managed through the Venmo app.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-25
item.description: Apple reportedly acquires VR startup ‘Spaces’ (1 minute read) Spaces is a startup with a team that specializes in virtual reality technologies.
